price: 82. Mpe Allah azali kolongisa bosembo na maloba naye ata soki batomboki bazali koboya.
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
